languages.text: В хранилище когитатора содержится летопись заключенных сделок между Саргоной и друкари. Капитан активно менял человеческих пленников на ксенотехнологии и не гнушался брать боем приглянувшуюся добычу.

Stored on the cogitator is a chronicle of various deals Sargona made with the Drukhari. The captain was actively bartering human captives for xenotech, and was not above violence when it came to acquiring what he coveted.
languages.original_text: В хранилище когитатора содержится летопись заключенных сделок между Саргоной и друкари. Капитан активно менял человеческих пленников на ксенотехнологии и не гнушался брать боем приглянувшуюся добычу.

traits.locale_text: Stored on the cogitator is a chronicle of deals Sargona made with the Drukhari. The captain was actively bartering human captives for xenos technology, and was not above violence when it came to getting what he coveted.

Stored on the cogitator is a chronicle of various deals Sargona made with the Drukhari. The captain was actively bartering human captives for xenotech, and was not above violence when it came to acquiring what he coveted.

languages.text: Auf dem Cogitator ist eine Chronik verschiedener Geschäfte zwischen Sargona und den Drukhari gespeichert. Der Kapitän hat menschliche Gefangene gegen Xenotech eingetauscht und schreckte bei der Verfolgung seiner Ziele auch vor Gewalt nicht zurück.
languages.original_text: Stored on the cogitator is a chronicle of various deals Sargona made with the Drukhari. The captain was actively bartering human captives for xenotech, and was not above violence when it came to acquiring what he coveted.

traits.locale_text: Auf dem Cogitator ist eine Chronik verschiedener Geschäfte zwischen Sargona und den Drukhari gespeichert. Der Kapitän hat menschliche Gefangene gegen Xenotech eingetauscht und schreckte bei der Verfolgung seiner Ziele auch vor Gewalt nicht zurück.

languages.text: La chronique des différents accords passés par Sargona avec les Drukharis est enregistrée dans le cogitateur. Le capitaine échangeait activement des prisonniers humains contre différentes xénotechnologies et n'hésitait pas à recourir à la violence pour obtenir ce qu'il convoitait.
languages.original_text: Stored on the cogitator is a chronicle of various deals Sargona made with the Drukhari. The captain was actively bartering human captives for xenotech, and was not above violence when it came to acquiring what he coveted.

traits.locale_text: La chronique des différents accords passés par Sargona avec les Drukharis est enregistrée dans le cogitateur. Le capitaine échangeait activement des prisonniers humains contre différentes xénotechnologies et n'hésitait pas à recourir à la violence pour obtenir ce qu'il convoitait.

languages.text: El cogitador guarda una crónica de las diversas transacciones que Sargona ha llevado a cabo con los Drukhari. El capitán se dedicaba a canjear prisioneros humanos por xenotecnología, y no dudaba en emplear la violencia con tal de obtener lo que deseaba.
languages.original_text: Stored on the cogitator is a chronicle of various deals Sargona made with the Drukhari. The captain was actively bartering human captives for xenotech, and was not above violence when it came to acquiring what he coveted.

traits.locale_text: El cogitador guarda una crónica de las diversas transacciones que Sargona ha llevado a cabo con los Drukhari. El capitán se dedicaba a canjear prisioneros humanos por xenotecnología, y no dudaba en emplear la violencia con tal de obtener lo que deseaba.

languages.text: 沉思者中存储的数据，记录着萨戈纳与黑暗灵族多年来的各项交易。萨戈纳舰长热衷于用人类俘虏交换异形科技造物，只要是为了得到他梦寐以求的东西，他会毫不犹豫地采取暴力手段。
languages.original_text: Stored on the cogitator is a chronicle of various deals Sargona made with the Drukhari. The captain was actively bartering human captives for xenotech, and was not above violence when it came to acquiring what he coveted.

traits.locale_text: 沉思者中存储的数据，记录着萨戈纳与黑暗灵族多年来的各项交易。萨戈纳舰长热衷于用人类俘虏交换异形科技造物，只要是为了得到他梦寐以求的东西，他会毫不犹豫地采取暴力手段。

languages.text: 考算機には、サルゴナがデュカーリと交わした様々な取引の記録が保管されている。そのキャプテンは異星技術を手に入れるため、人間の捕虜を進んで取引材料にし、欲望のためには暴力も辞さなかった。
languages.original_text: Stored on the cogitator is a chronicle of various deals Sargona made with the Drukhari. The captain was actively bartering human captives for xenotech, and was not above violence when it came to acquiring what he coveted.

traits.locale_text: 考算機には、サルゴナがデュカーリと交わした様々な取引の記録が保管されている。そのキャプテンは異星技術を手に入れるため、人間の捕虜を進んで取引材料にし、欲望のためには暴力も辞さなかった。

languages.text: Kavramsayarda Sargona'nın Drukharilerle yaptığı çeşitli anlaşmaların kayıtları saklı. Kaptan, insan esirleriyle zeno teknolojisi takas ediyormuş. Mesele göz koyduğu şeyi elde etmek olunca da şiddete başvurmaktan çekinmemiş.
languages.original_text: Stored on the cogitator is a chronicle of various deals Sargona made with the Drukhari. The captain was actively bartering human captives for xenotech, and was not above violence when it came to acquiring what he coveted.

traits.locale_text: Kavramsayarda Sargona'nın Drukharilerle yaptığı çeşitli anlaşmaların kayıtları saklı. Kaptan, insan esirleriyle zeno teknolojisi takas ediyormuş. Mesele göz koyduğu şeyi elde etmek olunca da şiddete başvurmaktan çekinmemiş.
